items.sentence: I may be antisocial, but it doesn't mean I don't talk to people.
Tom said that he wouldn't mind helping us move our refrigerator.
It seems like it's been a mighty long time since I've done that.
It doesn't matter what you sell, but you need to sell something.
You don't need to wait for an invitation. You're always welcome.
I hope that Tom understands that this doesn't happen very often.
Now that you're here in Boston, we can spend more time together.
I wish I could've spent more time with my father before he died.
I hope to enjoy a drink or two with my friends after work today.
Things haven't changed much around here in the past three years.
